title: Currajong: a different way (TEFC)
creator_credit: Steve Thomas and Steve Thomas Video Productions
brief_description: A look at Currajong Primary School, an establishment catering for “intelligent underachievers”. Describes its unique approach to working with kids who have failed in all kinds of schools.
creator_credit_for_label: Steve Thomas and Steve Thomas Video Productions
